article.headline: North Texas 57, NW Oklahoma St 47
article.story: DENTON, Texas (AP) -- Michael Jones scored 13 points and Michael DeGrate added 12 as North Texas beat Northwestern Oklahoma State 57-47 Friday night. North Texas (1-0) trailed 22-21 at halftime before outscoring Northwestern Oklahoma State 36-25 in the second half. Scott Roniger's basket midway through the second half gave the Eagles the lead for good. Devon Jefferson scored 15 points and grabbed eight rebounds for Northwestern Oklahoma State (2-2). Jones was 5-of-7 from the field and connected on both of his 3-point attempts. DeGrate had five assists. Northwestern Oklahoma State was 18-of-52 from the field and 3-of-8 from the foul line. They also had 21 turnovers.
